## merge() function

Accepts two broadcaster functions for merging Returns a function that accepts a listener, and applies the listener to both broadcasters - this returns an unsubscribe function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function merge(broadcaster1: IBroadcaster, broadcaster2: IBroadcaster): IBroadcaster;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  broadcaster1 | IBroadcaster | duration of timout in milliseconds |
|  broadcaster2 | IBroadcaster | duration of timout in milliseconds |

<b>Returns:</b>

IBroadcaster

{<!-- -->function(listener: VoidCallback): Unsubscribe<!-- -->} a function accepting a callback listener that returns and unsubscribe function
